Ever since this patch came out the game has been displaying my flex rank in normals/arams instead of my solo/duo rank...u know the one i actually played...Can this be reverted or at least have the choice between which one is displayed.
Kayn and Zed should share a skin for the special interactions between the two or at least give Zed quotes reffering to Kayn, and please Nerf Yasuo

Ornn is literally dumpstered now. Can't trade in lane because no shield/regen reduced, why did you bring unstoppable back to replace the shield? how can I USE unstoppable if its 0.75 seconds long. Why not just a reduction in shield strength? Zed and Yasuo both have higher winrates and play rates, both of them are hyper carries, but you nerf the champ that is mainly based around team play . GG riot {{summoner:50}}

Can we talk about how Ornn can no longer "choose" what items he can upgrade and has received a big nerf IMO because of this.

He is now limited to what items he builds first so that he can get the masterwork upgrades he wants. I feel this is bit stupid and really can limit Ornns early game build paths.

The fact that he also can't choose which item manually and has to communicate with the team to change item slots that they can upgrade the one they want is maybe not an issue in an elo where people talk but down here people either ignore you or have all chat disabled.

I might be the minority but I feel like a few QOL changes would be nice. Like if you could choose or hold off and not upgrade you items immediately or at least pay a portion of the cost to swap the upgrade. 
With teammate upgrades if you could select them I feel that simply replacing Ornns "mini shop" to let you pick which item to upgrade would just be a bit more streamlined. 




Also if I'm just a massive idiot and missed something that does allow you to pick choose then any flame is accepted and appreciated <3
